title: Is We Dumb? | Blimp. Jammer. Cool Father. Floppy Card.
description:
Remember that one time your mom dropped you off at a friend's house and then that grown man let you drive his Jeep 85 mph on the freeway when you were 12 years old because he wanted to be a cool father? Yikes. Let's talk about that, what the hell is inside a blimp cabin, terrible experiences with TSA, a dad that accidentally blocked an entire town's internet and cell service, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

 

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

 

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/oFEublPR1eA

 

Suggestions for segment content: dumb@iswedumb.com

Anything else: info@iswedumb.com

author: dan@dancummins.tv (Dan Cummins)
